casebody.data:
Second Department,

June, 1942.

(June 1, 1942.) Central Hanover Bank and Trust Company, as Substituted Trustee under Trust Agreement Dated January 3, 1928, Made by Elizabeth C. G. Russell, Respondent, v. Sarah B. Russell and Others, Defendants, and David P. Cohen, as Guardian ad Litem for Adele Carew and Others, Appellants.

Motion for reargument denied, with ten dollars costs. Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals denied. Present — Lazansky, P. J., Carswell, Johnston, Taylor and Close, JJ.
